mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_room ( room_type_sid, room_info, price, adult_limit, child_limit, delete_yn, created_date, modified_date ) VALUES ( #{room_type_sid}, #{room_info}, #{price}, #{adult_limit}, #{child_limit}, 'N', now(), now() )
INSERT INTO tb_options( room_sid, option_name, option_value, option_type ) VALUES ( #{room_sid}, #{option_name}, #{option_value}, #{option_type} )
INSERT INTO tb_room_img( room_sid, original_name, img_name, extension, img_type ) VALUES ( #{room_sid}, #{original_name}, #{img_name}, #{extension}, #{img_type} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, COUNT(RL.room_number) AS available_rooms, TI.img_name, TI.original_name, RT.type_name, RT.bed_size, RT.room_size FROM tb_room AS R LEFT JOIN tb_room_type AS RT ON R.room_type_sid = RT.room_type_sid LEFT JOIN tb_hotel_layout AS RL ON R.room_sid = RL.room_sid LEFT JOIN tb_room_img AS TI ON R.room_sid = TI.room_sid LEFT JOIN tb_reservation AS RES ON RL.room_number = RES.room_number AND RES.start_date <= #{end_date} AND RES.end_date >= #{start_date} WHERE R.delete_yn = 'N' AND TI.img_type = 'thumbnail' AND R.adult_limit >= #{adult_cnt} AND R.child_limit >= #{child_cnt} AND RES.room_number IS NULL GROUP BY R.room_sid, RT.type_name, RT.bed_size, RT.room_size, TI.img_name, TI.original_name ORDER BY R.room_sid DESC LIMIT #{recordSize} OFFSET #{pagination.limitStart}
SELECT TR.*, RT.type_name as room_name FROM tb_room as TR LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_room_type AS RT ON TR.room_type_sid = RT.room_type_sid WHERE delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY room_sid DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_room WHERE delete_yn = 'N' AND adult_limit >= #{adult_cnt} AND child_limit >= #{child_cnt}

SELECT TR.* , OP.option_name , OP.option_value, TI.img_name,TI.original_name FROM tb_room AS TR LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_options AS OP ON TR.room_sid = OP.room_sid LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_room_img AS TI ON TR.room_sid = TI.room_sid WHERE TR.delete_yn = 'Y' AND TI.img_type = 'thumbnail' ORDER BY TR.room_sid DESC;

SELECT TR.*, OP.option_name, OP.option_value,OP.option_type, TI.img_name,TI.original_name,TI.room_img_sid,TI.img_type, RT.type_name,RT.bed_size,RT.room_size FROM tb_room AS TR LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_options AS OP ON TR.room_sid = OP.room_sid LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_room_img AS TI ON TR.room_sid = TI.room_sid LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_room_type AS RT ON TR.room_type_sid = RT.room_type_sid WHERE TR.room_sid = #{room_sid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_room WHERE room_type_sid = #{roomTypeSid} AND delete_yn = 'N'
SELECT * FROM tb_room_img WHERE room_sid = ${room_sid} AND img_type = 'thumbnail'
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_room SET room_info = #{room_info}, price = #{price}, adult_limit = #{adult_limit}, child_limit = #{child_limit}, modified_date = now() WHERE room_sid = #{room_sid}
